title: A few questions about LeaverBuster
body: So My League Decieded to Crash, and when I got everything working again, I got the LeaverBuster, When I joined the game I was expecting the usual 5 minutes, instead I got 10, so I said to myself that I must of left a game a while back, My Question is, after I've played the 5 games, and not left or wait afk for amount of time, does it go back to 5 minutes? Also, do bot games count? As in if they make the meter go down for the five games I have to play. Sorry if this post was hard to read/confusing, English isn't my first language ;-;

replies.body: Since riot didnt answer you, no. It will stay 10 mins, then go to 15 next time, and after that, 20

Your leaverbuster level should decay over time if you continue to play games without disconnecting. Bot games do count towards working off your leaverbuster since it also happens to be a game mode that you can earn leaverbuster penalties in. 

For a complete rundown, check out our [Leaverbuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ). Let me know if you have any questions.
